oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A map of the British and French settlements in North America.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hinton, John, -1781.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Society of Anti-Gallicans.; Maps shelf.; North America, East of the Mississippi--Maps.; Crown Point (N.Y.)--Maps.; Fort Saint Frederic (Crown Point, N.Y.)--Maps.; United States--History--French and Indian War, 1754-1763--Maps.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Shows provincial boundaries and identifies important forts.; Similar to map produced by the Society of Anti-Gallicans.; Below title: Universal magazine.
